citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 pm on
02/16/2016. APHIS ACI contacted the licensee via telephone and it was determined that no responsible person
was available to go on an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:10 pm on
02/16/2016.  APHIS ACI contacted the licensee via telephone and it was determined that no responsible person
was available to go on an inspection.
